definition: to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
anti-Qing revolutionary party set up in 1904 under Cai Yuanpei 蔡元培/same as 光復會|光复会

sentences.english: A rebuilt railcar has been displayed in a corner of Tai-Yuan Road and Civic Blvd. , Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 展示于台北市太原路市民大道口的复古汽油车。

sentences.english: and they try to go into a little bit of antiques.
sentences.chinese: 有些人也会尝试一些复古的角色。

sentences.english: Talk to the clerk at the vintage store to see whether there is a section set aside for your designer of choice.
sentences.chinese: 和复古店的店员交谈看自己选择的设计师是否有专柜。

sentences.english: In other words, everything about poetry is atavistic.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，诗歌的一切，都是复古的。

sentences.english: I used an old curtain found at my favorite antique shop!
sentences.chinese: 我在最喜欢的复古杂货店里找到这块旧窗帘布。

sentences.english: The embroidered red silk organza illusion cap sleeve gown with tulle ruffle skirt is both romantic and dramatic in equal parts.
sentences.chinese: 这件红色丝质刺绣的薄纱花边裙看起来浪漫又复古。

sentences.english: I saw an old lady wearing a big classical hat today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我看到一个年迈的女人戴着一顶很大的复古帽子。

sentences.english: A lot vintage shops and a lot quirkily dressed people, a lot young people.
sentences.chinese: 大量的复古店和许多穿着奇装异服的人，很多年轻人。

sentences.english: I saw this great retro photo of Coca-Cola in a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我在一个饭店里看见了这张复古的可口可乐照片。

sentences.english: One of the key attractions of retrogaming may lie in its limitations.
sentences.chinese: 复古游戏最吸引人的一点可能是它们有所限制。

sentences.english: London is well-known for its vintage fashion.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦因其复古时尚而出名。

sentences.english: The technophiliac route forward would lead to a reversionary future.
sentences.chinese: 这一技术狂路线会引领我们走向一个复古的未来。

sentences.english: “In the past year, the retro look in diamonds has been very popular, ” says Eve Goldberg, co-owner of William Goldberg Diamond Corporation, which produced the custom-designed ring.
sentences.chinese: 在过去，这种复古样式的钻戒设计是相当受欢迎的。

sentences.english: Retro-inspired acetate frame is crafted in an angular plastic cut.
sentences.chinese: 复古风格的醋酸帧是在一个角的塑料切割制作。

sentences.english: She likes to restore historical fixer-uppers.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢还原复古的装潢。

sentences.english: The retro apartment is inspired y the youth and optimism 21 centuries.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪的活力和乐观主义诱发出独特的复古气氛。

definition: to mix and match (of clothing etc)
high street (main street of a town or city) (loanword)
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
